title: Khloe Kardashian is labelled a 'lunatic' and 'psycho' as she clashes with friends
text:
The clear blue ocean and sandy white beaches of Turks and Caicos are the perfect spot to get away from it all.

But Khloe Kardashian and her sister Kourtney took the drama with them on their girl's trip this summer.

The two are seen clashing with their friends in a teaser trailer from the upcoming episode of Keeping Up With The Kardashians.

Having fun: But Khloe Kardashian was soon labelled a 'lunatic' and 'psycho' as she and Kourtney clash with friends on wild girl's trip in new taser for Keeping Up With The Kardashians

Leap of faith: The vacationers leapt off a boat into the clear blue ocean

Touch down: She held her nose as she went into the water

The trailer starts with Kourtney telling the camera: 'It is the perfect time to let loose.'

We then see the siblings doing exactly that as they and their pals jump from a boat into the ocean in high spirits.

But the good mood doesn't last as day turns into night, as they party with a large group of friends including Larsa Pippen, the Haqq twins, and Steph Shep, among others.

We see one of their group being pushed into a fountain by Khloe, before there are cross words in a night club.

Night out: We see one of their group being pushed into a fountain by Khloe, before there are cross words in a night club

Not happy: Never one to hold back, Khloe all but shouts: 'Do you have a problem?'

Well, yes she does: The friends look on as Khloe speaks her mind

Catfights: The friends seem unimpressed with Khloe's explanation

Staying out of it: Kourtney watched the drama unfold

Unimpressed: Her friend tells her: 'You're acting like a lunatic coming in here like a psycho'

Never one to hold back, Khloe all but shouts: 'Do you have a problem? If you do just say it.'

Her friend tells her: 'You're acting like a lunatic coming in here like a psycho.'

But the catfights don't seem to have upset the sisters, with a smiling Khloe telling the camera: 'This is exactly what a good girl's trip should be.'
description: The clear blue ocean and sandy white beaches of Turks and Caicos are the perfect spot to get away from it all.
